title: HoP 301 - The Empire Strikes Back - Introduction to Byzantine Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 301 - The Empire Strikes Back - Introduction to Byzantine Philosophy
description: We begin to look at the third tradition of medieval philosophy, in which the heritage of classical antiquity is preserved and debated by the Byzantines.
content:encoded: We begin to look at the third tradition of medieval philosophy, in which the heritage of classical antiquity is preserved and debated by the Byzantines.
itunes:subtitle: We begin to look at the third tradition of medieval philosophy, in which the heritage of classical antiquity is preserved and debated by the Byzantines.
itunes:summary: We begin to look at the third tradition of medieval philosophy, in which the heritage of classical antiquity is preserved and debated by the Byzantines.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson
